main event: A young boy and his mother reported seeing a saucer-shaped object land in Peterson, Minnesota.
interesting points: The boy claimed to have seen a saucer land, while his mother noted there were no physical traces left behind., An additional report described a bright metallic object observed hovering in the sky for about 30 minutes., Another witness mentioned a brilliant light in the center of the object and a strobing red light on top., There were multiple reports from different witnesses in the area regarding similar sightings., A request was made for further information, as the initial reports were insufficient for scientific evaluation.
witness description: A young boy and his mother
